markdown.headingText: When and Where Do Classes Meet?
markdown.markdown:
All classes meet in person in Room E321-323 in the Robbins Building at the CWRU School of Medicine, from 1:00 to 2:15 PM. - Each class session is **recorded** via Zoom, and the recordings are then made available for students to view using Canvas. - Students attending remotely (for whatever reason) can watch the Zoom as it happens (through [Canvas](https://canvas.case.edu/)), but will not be able to interact with the class during the session. - Students are expected to attend **at least 20** of the 26 classes during the semester in person. ## Details - The link for each class is to the README (starting point), which contains key announcements, slides and other links for that session. - Readings are identified by: - **AOS** = David Spiegelhalter's *The Art of Statistics* - **R4DS** = Hadley Wickham, Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel and Garrett Grolemund, [R for Data Science, 2nd edition](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/) - Note that solutions for the exercises in R4DS 2e [are available here](https://mine-cetinkaya-rundel.github.io/r4ds-solutions/). ## December 2023 | LINK | Date | Details | |:--------:|:--------:|:---------------------------------------------------| | *Quiz 2 due* | TUE
12-05 | [Quiz 2](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-quizzes-2023) due at **3 PM**. | [Class 25](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class25) | TUE
12-05 | Favorite Movies and AMA Session via Zoom.
**READING** By now, **AOS** complete book | *min paper* | WED
12-06 | [Minute Paper after Class 25](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-minute-2023) due at Noon. | [Class 26](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class26) | THU
12-07 | Last class. Quiz 2 discussion, and Setting Up 432. | *Lab Regrade?* | FRI 12-08 | (Optional) Submit [Lab Regrade Request Form](https://bit.ly/431-lab-regrade-form-2023) by noon | *Presentations* | 12-11 through
12-14 | [Project B](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-projectB-2023/) Presentations to Dr. Love ([Schedule](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/blob/main/projB/schedule.md))
12-11 is Last Day of TA office hours | *Lab X* | TUE
12-12 | (Optional) [Lab X](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-labX/) due at Noon. | *Project B* | SUN
12-17 | Final [Project B](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-projectB-2023/) All Materials due at **9 AM** (submitted via Canvas, and Google Form) ## Remaining Project B deadlines - [Project B](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-projectB-2023/) Presentations are scheduled for 12-11 through 12-14. The schedule is [now available](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/blob/main/projB/schedule.md). - [Project B](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-projectB-2023/) materials are due Sunday 2023-12-17 at **9 AM**. ## August & September 2023 | LINK | Date | Details | |:--------:|:--------:|:---------------------------------------------------| | [Class 01](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class01) | TUE
08-29 | Welcome to 431, How The Course Works
Getting Started with R, RStudio and Quarto | *survey* | WED
08-30 | [Welcome to 431 Survey](https://bit.ly/431-2023-welcome-survey) due at Noon | [Class 02](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class02) | THU
08-31 | **PART A** begins; see [Course Notes](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-notes/).
Types of Data, Summarizing Quantitative Data | [Class 03](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class03) | TUE
09-05 | Visualizing and Managing Data with RStudio and the Tidyverse
**READING** By now, **AOS** Intro & Chapter 1, **R4DS** through Chapter 3
First Day of TA office hours | *min paper* | WED
09-06 | [Minute Paper after Class 03](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-minute-2023) due at Noon. | [Class 04](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class04) | THU
09-07 | Describing Quantitative and Categorical Data | *Lab 1 due* | TUE
09-12 | [Lab 1](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-labs-2023/tree/main) due at Noon. | [Class 05](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class05) | TUE
09-12 | Visualizing and Describing Data
**READING** By now, **AOS** through Chapter 3, **R4DS** through Chapter 5 and skim 11 | *min paper* | WED
09-13 | [Minute Paper after Class 05](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-minute-2023) due at Noon. | [Class 06](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class06) | THU
09-14 | Visualizations for Comparisons and Associations | *Lab 2 due* | TUE
09-19 | [Lab 2](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-labs-2023/tree/main) due at Noon. | [Class 07](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class07) | TUE
09-19 | Visualizing Quantitative Data
**READING** By now, **AOS** through Chapter 4, **R4DS** Chapters 6-7, 10-11 | [Class 08](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class08) | THU
09-21 | Categorical Data; Scatterplots, Linear Fits and Power Transformations
Movies Breakout 1 | *Lab 3 due* | TUE
09-26 | [Lab 3](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-labs-2023/tree/main) due at Noon. | [Class 09](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class09) | TUE
09-26 | Building Confidence Intervals for a Mean or Difference Between Means
**READING** By now, **AOS** through Chapter 5, **R4DS** Chapters 1-7, 10-12 | *min paper* | WED
09-27 | [Minute Paper after Class 09](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-minute-2023) due at Noon. | [Class 10](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class10) | THU
09-28 | Data Management, Wrangling and the Tidyverse with the Movies Data ## October 2023 | LINK | Date | Details | |:--------:|:--------:|:---------------------------------------------------| | *Proposal A* | TUE
10-03 | [Project A Proposal](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-projectA-2023/) due at Noon. | [Class 11](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class11) | TUE
10-03 | **PART B** begins; see [Course Notes](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-notes/).
Regression on a Categorical Predictor, Single Imputation
**READING** By now, **AOS** through Chapter 6, **R4DS** Chapters 1-12, 29-30 | *min paper* | WED
10-04 | [Minute Paper after Class 11](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-minute-2023) due at Noon. | [Class 12](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class12) | THU
10-05 | Comparing Means with Paired Samples | - | THU
10-05 | [Quiz 1](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-quizzes-2023) made available to you by 5 PM. | *Quiz 1 due* | TUE
10-10 | [Quiz 1](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-quizzes-2023) due at Noon.
Quiz 1 covers material from Classes 1-12. | [Class 13](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class13) | TUE
10-10 | Comparing Means with Independent Samples
**READING** By now, **AOS** through Chapter 7 | *min paper* | WED
10-11 | [Minute Paper after Class 13](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-minute-2023) due at Noon. | [Class 14](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class14) | THU
10-12 | Comparing Rates and Proportions, 2x2 and Larger Tables | *Lab 4 due* | TUE
10-17 | [Lab 4](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-labs-2023/tree/main) due at Noon. | [Class 15](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class15) | TUE
10-17 | Power and Sample Size Considerations
**READING** By now, **AOS** through Chapter 8 | *min paper* | WED
10-18 | [Minute Paper after Class 15](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-minute-2023) due at Noon. | [Class 16](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class16) | THU
10-19 | P values and their problems | No class | *TUE
10-24* | CWRU Fall Break.
Now is a great time to work on [Lab X](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-labX/).
No TA office hours 10-23 or 10-24 | *Lab 5 due* | THU
10-26 | [Lab 5](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-labs-2023/tree/main) due at Noon. | [Class 17](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class17) | THU
10-26 | Catching Up: Miscellaneous Things I Haven't Gotten To Yet
**READING** By now, **AOS** through Chapter 9 | *Project A* | TUE
10-31 | [Project A Portfolio](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-projectA-2023/) due at Noon.
[Project A](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-projectA-2023/) uses material from Classes 1-12. | [Class 18](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class18) | TUE
10-31 | **PART C** begins; see [Course Notes](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-notes/). One-Factor and Two-Factor ANOVA
**READING** By now, **AOS** through Chapter 10, **R4DS** skim Chapters 13-28 ## Project A deadlines - [Project A](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-projectA-2023/) Proposal will be due at noon on Tuesday 2023-10-03. We will provide proposal feedback as soon as possible after that deadline. - The final [Project A Portfolio](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-projectA-2023/) including the R data set, Quarto and HTML report, video and self-evaluation form are all due at noon on Tuesday 2023-10-31. ## November 2023 | LINK | Date | Details | |:--------:|:--------:|:---------------------------------------------------| | *min paper* | WED
11-01 | [Minute Paper after Class 18](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-minute-2023) due at Noon. | [Class 19](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class19) | THU
11-02 | Multiple Regression Modeling, Part 1 | No class | *TUE
11-07* | Election Day. (No 431 class but CWRU is open.)
Now is a great time to work on [Lab X](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-labX/). | *Lab 6 due* | THU
11-09 | [Lab 6](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-labs-2023/tree/main) due at Noon. | [Class 20](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class20) | THU
11-09 | **ZOOM ONLY** (See email for details) Multiple Regression Modeling, Part 2 | [Class 21](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class21) | TUE
11-14 | Checking Regression Assumptions, Large Contingency Tables
**READING** By now, **AOS** through Chapter 11 | *Project B* | THU
11-16 | **CHANGED** [Project B](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-projectB-2023/) [Registration Form](https://bit.ly/431-projB-registration-2023) due at 9 AM. | [Class 22](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class22) | THU
11-16 | Using mice to perform multiple imputation, It's All A Linear Model | No class | *TUE
11-21* | Thanksgiving week. (No 431 class but CWRU is open.)
No TA office hours 11-19 through 11-25 | No class | *THU
11-23* | CWRU Thanksgiving Break
No TA office hours 11-19 through 11-25 | *Lab 7* | TUE
11-28 | [Lab 7](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-labs-2023/tree/main) due at Noon. | [Class 23](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class23) | TUE
11-28 | Multiple Regression Modeling, continued
**READING** By now, **AOS** through Chapter 12 | *min paper* | WED
11-29 | [Minute Paper after Class 23](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-minute-2023) due at **2 PM**. | [Class 24](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-classes-2023/tree/main/class24) | THU
11-30 | Some Loose Ends: Power/McNemar/here/77 to NA/ChatGPT, etc. | - | THU
11-30 | [Quiz 2](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-quizzes-2023) made available to you by 5 PM.
Quiz 2 covers material from Classes 1-24. # TA office hours TA office hours are held via Zoom, and will begin on **Tuesday 2023-09-05** and will continue through Monday 2023-12-11. They will be held at the following times. MON | TUE | WED | THU | FRI | SAT | SUN :------: | :------: | :------: | :------: | :------: | :------: | :------: 11:40 am
to

8:30 pm | - | - | - | - | - | - Our Shared Google Drive (431 Fall 2023 Dr Love and Students) holds [Zoom](https://cwru.zoom.us/) links for each of these sessions in a document called **TA office hours schedule and Zoom links**. No appointment is necessary. Please just drop in. - Professor Love will also hold “drop-in hours” for 10 minutes before and for 30 minutes after each class on Tuesdays and Thursdays. - Office hours are canceled on 2023-10-23 and 2023-10-24 (Fall Break) and from 2023-11-19 through 2023-11-25 (Thanksgiving) - More information on each of the TAs this semester is found in [this section of our Syllabus](https://thomaselove.github.io/431-syllabus-2023/08_teachingassistants.html).
